unit.name: Short Range Surface To Air Defense Troop

mission.name: AAA - defend area (from a position) (Short Range)
ART - Short Range Radar - collect intelligence on objectives
ART - Surveillance Detachment - collect intelligence on objectives
ART - Long Range Surveillance Detachment - collect intelligence on objectives
ASY - carry out an attack (against armed forces)
ASY - carry out a bombing (against a crowd)
ENG - support a new crossing site
INT - Imagery Intelligence - report information (real time UAV)
MLSECURITY - Confine urban blocks within area
MLSECURITY - Lift urban blocks confinement within area
MLSECURITY - Evacuate urban blocks within area
MLSECURITY - Lift urban blocks evacuation within area
MLSECURITY - Alert urban blocks within area
MLSECURITY - Lift urban blocks alert within area

automat.name: Short Range Surface To Air Battery

mission.name: AIR - assist flying unit in rearward maneuver
INT - Imagery Intelligence - report information (real time UAV)
